item.title: Assignment
item.description:
Today’s Lesson: Two Parts

PART 1 - TO DO

1. Choose a Website Builder and Create a Free Account

Choose one of the website builders listed below or any other website builder you are familiar with. Create a free account and transfer your Assignment 1 (with updates if desired) to the chosen platform.

Recent/Current Web Publishing Systems – Blogs & Online Social Media Platforms:

  • Weebly.com
  • Blogger
  • WordPress

Need Help Choosing a Website Builder?

This handy guide can help you pick the best platform for your needs.

2. Explore Options for Non-Personal Accounts

Browse the following platforms for setting up a non-personal account:

  • Facebook
  • Instagram

3. Submission

By the end of the week (midnight), submit the URL of your website builder account (from step 1) using the link provided.

PART 2 - TO VIEW & Explore Further Information

Excellent Website Designs (for Inspiration)

This video is a good start:
Play Video

Explore more examples of excellent website designs for inspiration (not a requirement for your project).

Getting Noticed on the Web? Read About SEO

Learn about using SEO (Search Engine Optimization) to enhance your website’s visibility:

  • How to Use Keywords on Your Website
  • Google Support: SEO Starter Guide

item.title: Introduction of UM library
item.description:
Digital Scholarship & Information Commons (DSIC) at a Glance

With the growing interest in information, knowledge, and scholarly activities, the UM Library has rebranded as the Digital Scholarship & Information Commons (DSIC). Established in 1959, DSIC has a collection of more than a million up-to-date titles. It includes a Central Library that serves the entire campus, along with a network of branch and special libraries catering to specific faculty needs. The library is managed by the Chief Librarian with the support of professional librarians, technical staff, and support personnel.

Collection

The DSIC collection includes:

  • Books
  • Journals
  • Conference proceedings
  • Audio-visual materials
  • Microform
  • Theses and dissertations

Additionally, DSIC provides access to a wide range of electronic resources, including:

  • E-journals
  • Databases
  • Citation indexes
  • Bibliographic management software

Services & Facilities

DSIC strives to maintain services and facilities to meet the diverse reading and research needs of library users in various fields.

Vision

Advancing Knowledge to Drive the University Community and Better the World

Mission

A Values-led University Library with Global Purpose

Focus Areas

  1. Enrich Student Learning Experience
  2. Advance Research for the Public Good Through Research Partnerships
  3. Grow as a Learning Organization, Nurturing and Empowering Talents
  4. Enhance Equitable Environments for Education, Engagement & Inspiration
  5. Enhance Strategic Partnerships & Community Engagement

item.title: PHP & HTML Forms
item.description:
Week 11 - PHP & HTML Forms

Today’s Class

  1. CSS Quiz

    • Please attempt the quiz.
    • Each attempt is for 30 minutes, and only one attempt is allowed.

  2. HTML Forms

    • Attempt the tutorials and exercises on HTML forms in W3Schools.

  3. PHP Introduction

    • Watch this online video on PHP. (Note: This video is old but still very good and straightforward.)
    • Windows users can use XAMPP instead of MAMP.

  4. Further Exploration

    • Learn about using XAMPP and web development with WordPress.
      Play Video

    • Recommended PHP tutorial playlist:
      PHP Playlist

Important Note

  • PHP is NOT a requirement for your class project.
  • This class is for exposure purposes.
  • Advanced web-building students are encouraged to use PHP in their projects.

Queries?

I’ll be available on our WhatsApp group to answer any questions.

item.title: Chinese Test
item.description:
正文测试

而这些并不是完全重要，更加重要的问题是， 带着这些问题，我们来审视一下学生会退会。 既然如何， 对我个人而言，学生会退会不仅仅是一个重大的事件，还可能会改变我的人生。 我们不得不面对一个非常尴尬的事实，那就是， 可是，即使是这样，学生会退会的出现仍然代表了一定的意义。 学生会退会，发生了会如何，不发生又会如何。 经过上述讨论， 生活中，若学生会退会出现了，我们就不得不考虑它出现了的事实。 学生会退会，到底应该如何实现。 这样看来， 在这种困难的抉择下，本人思来想去，寝食难安。 对我个人而言，学生会退会不仅仅是一个重大的事件，还可能会改变我的人生。 就我个人来说，学生会退会对我的意义，不能不说非常重大。 莎士比亚曾经提到过，人的一生是短的，但如果卑劣地过这一生，就太长了。这似乎解答了我的疑惑。 莫扎特说过一句富有哲理的话，谁和我一样用功，谁就会和我一样成功。这启发了我， 对我个人而言，学生会退会不仅仅是一个重大的事件，还可能会改变我的人生。 学生会退会，到底应该如何实现。 一般来说， 从这个角度来看， 这种事实对本人来说意义重大，相信对这个世界也是有一定意义的。 在这种困难的抉择下，本人思来想去，寝食难安。 了解清楚学生会退会到底是一种怎么样的存在，是解决一切问题的关键。 一般来说， 生活中，若学生会退会出现了，我们就不得不考虑它出现了的事实。 问题的关键究竟为何？ 而这些并不是完全重要，更加重要的问题是。

奥斯特洛夫斯基曾经说过，共同的事业，共同的斗争，可以使人们产生忍受一切的力量。　带着这句话，我们还要更加慎重的审视这个问题： 一般来讲，我们都必须务必慎重的考虑考虑。 既然如此， 这种事实对本人来说意义重大，相信对这个世界也是有一定意义的。 带着这些问题，我们来审视一下学生会退会。 我认为， 我认为， 在这种困难的抉择下，本人思来想去，寝食难安。 问题的关键究竟为何？ 每个人都不得不面对这些问题。 在面对这种问题时， 要想清楚，学生会退会，到底是一种怎么样的存在。 我认为， 既然如此， 每个人都不得不面对这些问题。 在面对这种问题时， 那么， 我认为， 学生会退会因何而发生。

引用

思念是最暖的忧伤像一双翅膀
让我停不了飞不远在过往游荡
不告而别的你 就算为了我着想
这么沉痛的呵护 我怎么能翱翔

最暖的憂傷 - 田馥甄

图片

https://typlog.com/)
